chemicals.description: High-quality calcium hypochlorite with 70% active chlorine content. Widely used for water treatment, disinfection, and bleaching applications in industrial settings.
Premium grade hydrochloric acid with 35% concentration. Essential for laboratory analysis, pH adjustment, and various chemical processes.
Food grade citric acid monohydrate. Used as a natural preservative, acidulant, and chelating agent in food, pharmaceutical, and agricultural applications.
High purity ethanol with 96% concentration. Suitable for laboratory use, pharmaceutical applications, and as a solvent in various chemical processes.
Concentrated nitric acid for laboratory and industrial applications. Used in metal etching, fertilizer production, and various chemical syntheses.
Anhydrous sodium sulfate for industrial applications. Used in detergent manufacturing, glass production, and textile processing.
Industrial grade formaldehyde solution. Used in resin production, disinfection, and as a preservative in various industrial applications.
Light grade soda ash (sodium carbonate) for industrial use. Essential in glass manufacturing, detergent production, and water treatment.
High purity caustic soda flakes with 99% sodium hydroxide content. Used in soap manufacturing, paper production, and chemical processing.
Sodium Lauryl Ether Sulfate with 70% active matter. Primary surfactant used in detergent and personal care product manufacturing.
Glacial acetic acid with 99.7% purity. Used in laboratory analysis, pharmaceutical synthesis, and as a chemical reagent.
High-quality activated carbon for water treatment, air purification, and industrial filtration applications.
Activated bleaching earth for oil refining and purification processes. Removes impurities and improves oil quality.
Technical grade aluminum sulfate for water treatment, soil conditioning, and as a coagulant in various applications.
High-quality ammonium sulfate fertilizer. Provides nitrogen and sulfur nutrients essential for plant growth and soil improvement.
Effective antifoaming agent for industrial processes. Prevents foam formation in manufacturing and processing applications.
Water treatment antiscalant to prevent scale formation in boilers, cooling towers, and industrial water systems.
Specialized antiscalant for reverse osmosis systems. Prevents membrane fouling and extends system life.
Vitamin C (ascorbic acid) for pharmaceutical, food, and agricultural applications. Acts as an antioxidant and preservative.
High purity boric acid for laboratory use, glass manufacturing, and as a mild antiseptic in various applications.
Food grade calcium chloride with 77% purity. Used as a firming agent, preservative, and electrolyte in food processing and beverages.
High-quality caustic soda pearls (sodium hydroxide) for industrial applications. Used in soap manufacturing, paper production, and chemical processing.
Fine grade calcium carbonate for various industrial uses, including as a filler in plastics, paints, and paper, and in construction materials.

chemicals.item: Citric Acid both mono and anhydrous
chemicals.description: Versatile citric acid available in both monohydrous and anhydrous forms. Widely used as an acidulant, flavor enhancer, and preservative in food, beverage, and pharmaceutical industries.
High-quality corn starch for food and industrial applications. Used as a thickening agent, binder, and stabilizer in various products.
Technical grade copper sulphate for agricultural and industrial uses. Effective as a fungicide, algaecide, and in electroplating.
Natural dolomite powder for various industrial applications, including as a flux in metallurgy, a filler in paints, and in agriculture for soil conditioning.
High purity glycerin for pharmaceutical, cosmetic, and food industries. Used as a humectant, solvent, and sweetener.
High-density polyethylene (HDPE) granules for plastic manufacturing. Known for its strength, durability, and resistance to chemicals, ideal for various molded products.
Low-density polyethylene (LDPE) granules for flexible plastic applications. Offers excellent flexibility, toughness, and transparency, suitable for films, bags, and packaging.
Concentrated hydrogen peroxide solution (50%) for various industrial applications, including bleaching, disinfection, and as an oxidizing agent.
High-grade industrial sodium chloride (salt) for various applications, including water treatment, chemical manufacturing, and de-icing.
Linear Alkyl Benzene Sulphonic Acid (LABSA) with 96% purity. A key ingredient in the production of detergents and cleaning agents due to its excellent surfactant properties.
High-quality lime (calcium oxide/hydroxide) sourced both locally and internationally. Used in construction, agriculture, and water treatment for pH adjustment and purification.
Concentrated liquid detergent for industrial and commercial cleaning applications. Effectively removes grease and grime from various surfaces.
High-quality masterbatch for coloring and enhancing plastic products. Provides consistent color dispersion and improves material properties.
Fine grade mica powder for various industrial applications, including paints, coatings, plastics, and cosmetics. Provides excellent insulation and aesthetic properties.
High-purity paraffin wax for various industrial and commercial uses, including candle making, coatings, and as a lubricant.
Concentrated perfume compounds for use in various products, including detergents, soaps, and personal care items. Provides long-lasting fragrance.
Technical grade phosphoric acid for industrial applications, including rust removal, water treatment, and as an additive in various chemical processes.
High-purity phosphoric acid (85%) suitable for food and beverage applications. Used as an acidulant, flavor enhancer, and preservative.
Effective poly aluminum chloride (PAC) for water treatment and purification. Acts as a coagulant to remove suspended solids and impurities from water.
High-quality polypropylene (PP) raffia grade granules for woven bags, carpets, and other textile applications. Offers excellent strength and durability.
Sodium Lauryl Ether Sulfate (SLES) with 70% active matter. A widely used surfactant in the production of detergents, shampoos, and other personal care products.
High-quality soap noodles, the basic raw material for manufacturing various types of soaps. Provides excellent lathering and cleaning properties.
Versatile soda ash (sodium carbonate) available in both light and dense forms. Essential for glass manufacturing, detergent production, and water treatment.
High-purity sodium bicarbonate (99%), commonly known as baking soda. Used in food, pharmaceutical, and industrial applications as a leavening agent, antacid, and cleaning agent.
High-purity sodium metabisulphite (99%) for various industrial uses, including as a reducing agent, preservative, and antioxidant in food, water treatment, and photography.
Food-grade sodium benzoate, widely used as a preservative in acidic foods and beverages to prevent microbial growth.
High-quality sodium hydroxide, a strong base used in various industrial processes, including soap and detergent manufacturing, pulp and paper production, and water treatment.
Sodium hydrosulphite (85%) for use as a powerful reducing agent in textile dyeing, paper making, and other industrial applications.
Sodium hypochlorite solution (10%) for disinfection, bleaching, and water treatment. Effective against a wide range of bacteria and viruses.
Industrial-grade softener for textile and laundry applications. Improves fabric feel, reduces wrinkles, and enhances overall quality.
Specialized stiffener for textile and paper industries. Provides rigidity and body to materials, improving their structural integrity.
Highly concentrated sulfuric acid (98%) for various industrial applications, including fertilizer production, chemical synthesis, and metal processing.
High-purity tetrachloroethylene (99%), also known as perc. Widely used as a solvent in dry cleaning and metal degreasing applications.
Toluene diisocyanate (TDI) for the production of polyurethanes, foams, and coatings. A key component in the manufacturing of flexible and rigid foams.
High-quality titanium dioxide, a white pigment used in paints, coatings, plastics, and paper. Provides excellent opacity, brightness, and UV resistance.
Food-grade trisodium citrate, used as an anticoagulant, emulsifier, and buffering agent in food and pharmaceutical industries.
Effective wetting agent for various industrial applications, including textiles, paints, and coatings. Improves the spreading and penetration of liquids on surfaces.
Natural zeolite for water purification, agriculture, and industrial applications. Acts as an adsorbent, ion exchanger, and catalyst.
Ethylenediaminetetraacetic acid (EDTA) for chelating metal ions in various industrial applications, including water treatment, detergents, and agriculture.
High-grade industrial salt (sodium chloride) for various applications, including water softening, chemical manufacturing, and de-icing.
Sodium silicate solution for use in detergents, adhesives, and as a binder in various industrial processes. Known for its excellent binding and adhesive properties.
Fine grade bentonite powder for various industrial applications, including drilling fluids, binders, and adsorbents. Known for its excellent swelling and thixotropic properties.
Glacial acetic acid with high purity for laboratory analysis, pharmaceutical synthesis, and as a chemical reagent.
Perchloroethylene (PCE) for use as a solvent in dry cleaning and metal degreasing applications. Known for its excellent solvency and non-flammability.
Polyethylene terephthalate (PET) resin for manufacturing bottles, films, and fibers. Known for its clarity, strength, and recyclability.
Ammonia solution for various industrial applications, including cleaning, refrigeration, and chemical synthesis.
Optical brightener for textiles, paper, and plastics. Enhances whiteness and brightness by converting UV light into visible blue light.
Polyacrylamide (PAM) for water treatment, flocculation, and sludge dewatering. Effective in clarifying water and improving solid-liquid separation.
Xanthan gum, a natural polysaccharide used as a thickening agent, stabilizer, and emulsifier in food, pharmaceutical, and industrial applications.
Ferric chloride solution for water and wastewater treatment. Acts as a coagulant and flocculant to remove impurities and suspended solids.
Hydrated lime (calcium hydroxide) for various industrial applications, including water treatment, construction, and agriculture. Used for pH adjustment and neutralization.
Quicklime (calcium oxide) for industrial applications, including steel production, construction, and water treatment. Known for its high reactivity and alkalinity.
Sodium permanganate for water treatment and oxidation processes. Effective in removing iron, manganese, and hydrogen sulfide from water.
Unconcentrated softener for textile and laundry applications. Provides softness and improves the feel of fabrics.
